scripts.prisma:validate: npm run -w travel-ops-oups prisma:env-check && env-cmd -f travel-ops-oups/.env npx prisma validate
scripts.prisma:pull: npm run -w travel-ops-oups prisma:env-check && env-cmd -f travel-ops-oups/.env npx prisma db pull
scripts.prisma:push: npm run -w travel-ops-oups prisma:env-check && env-cmd -f travel-ops-oups/.env npx prisma db push
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run -w travel-ops-oups prisma:env-check && env-cmd -f travel-ops-oups/.env npx prisma studio
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d
